name: Dungeon Runn
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Description

What does a guy with a gun in a infinite dungeon do? Of course hunt the monsters!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Basic explanation

This game is a topdown shooting game in a ramdomly generated dungeon. Pick up upgrades as you go from room to room, fight off monsters and Survive! Also lets see if you can become #1 in the leaderboard.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Controls

WASD And arrow keys to move, left click to shoot!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Enemies

3 types of enemies: A ghost,spider and a"Imp". 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Tips

Choose your upgrade at the start of the game wisely! 

dodge the bullets of the ghosts and attacks of the spiders and "Imps".

Remember this game is still in development! if you have any suggestions/feedback or if you found any bugs please comment it down below!
